name: Fine Dining
description:
Important:

If you don't understand how to play the game, here's some help:

Problem 1: How do I plant potatoes and wheat? You pick up the guest/customer and place them in the garden beds.

Problem 2: Why can't I feed the customers/guests? They can only be served when sitting at a table, once picked up, they cannot eat. They also can't be placed back btw.

Problem 3: How do I place a guest on the cutting board? When you serve a guest at a table they will become fat. If you pick them up before they leave (you just have a few seconds to do so), you will get a fed customer that can be sliced up.

End

"You are the owner of a renowned restaurant.

One day you open the restaurant and the guests start to order, but you suddenly realize that you have forgotten to buy any new pork, beef, or chicken.

But when you look over to the customers, an idea suddenly pops into your head."

Fine dining is a cooking game where you serve your customers to the other customers! 

What tools I used:

Game Engine: Unity
Art: Krita (mainly), Aseprite, and Paint.net
Music: BeepBox
